mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn,tt.* from (select seq,id_,title,theme,view_count from community where view_count is not null order by 5 desc)tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}
select * from (select rownum rn,tt.* from (select seq,id_,title,content_,theme,view_count,like_count,comment_ from community order by 1 desc)tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}
select id_,comment_ from community_comment where seq=#{seq}
mapper.delete: update community set title=#{title},content_= #{content_} where seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: update community set comment_ = comment_+1 where seq = #{seq}
update community set like_count=like_count+1 where seq = #{seq}
update community set like_count=like_count-1 where seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: select count(seq) from community_comment where seq = #{seq}
